title: Zigbee Lighting — Evening Scenes
summary: Smooth evening dimming for better comfort.
body:
Lamp at 30% at 20:00 then 10% at 22:00. Motion sensor in the hallway for soft night lighting.

**Tips**: 400–800 ms transitions, auto-off after 10 min without motion.

title: Security — IP Cameras & Alerts
body: Two IP cameras (entrance, garden). Motion notifications, activity zones, medium sensitivity.

title: Energy — Usage Tracking
body: Use Shelly EM or Zigbee plugs. Export to Home Assistant dashboards.
